name: Duck Hunt (Recreated)
description:
I worked on this game during my internship at Altitude Games. This is Duck Hunt. Yes, i just ported everything on mobile with Unity. I tried to make a 1:1 replica with the original but kinda didn't make it due to time constraints. Got to warn you about this one, it's pretty buggy.

All art and other gameplay element are owned by Nintendo Co., Ltd
